statements: SELECT * FROM scientific_literature;
SELECT title, author FROM scientific_literature WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM scientific_literature WHERE keywords LIKE '%science%';
SELECT title, author, citations FROM scientific_literature ORDER BY citations DESC;
SELECT author, publication_date FROM scientific_literature WHERE author = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT id, title, author FROM scientific_literature;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM scientific_literature WHERE citations > 100;
SELECT * FROM scientific_literature WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title, author, keywords FROM scientific_literature WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, title, publication_date, citations FROM scientific_literature ORDER BY publication_date DESC, citations ASC;
SELECT * FROM authors
SELECT author_name FROM authors
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1
SELECT publication_title, publication_year FROM publications ORDER BY publication_year DESC
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM authors WHERE author_id > 5;
SELECT publication_title, publication_year FROM publications WHERE publication_year = 2020 ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT publication_id, publication_title, author_name FROM publications INNER JOIN authors ON publications.author_id = authors.author_id;
SELECT MAX(publication_year) AS latest_publication_year, MIN(publication_year) AS earliest_publication_year FROM publications;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT article_title, keywords FROM articles WHERE author_id=1;
SELECT article_title FROM articles WHERE keywords LIKE '%research%';
SELECT article_title, c.citing_article_id, c.cited_article_id FROM articles a JOIN citations c ON a.article_id = c.citing_article_id;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_id, author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT article_id, article_title, keywords FROM articles WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT a.article_id, a.article_title, a.keywords, au.author_name FROM articles AS a JOIN authors AS au ON a.author_id = au.author_id;

SELECT c.citation_id, a1.article_title AS citing_article, a2.article_title AS cited_article FROM citations AS c JOIN articles AS a1 ON c.citing_article_id = a1.article_id JOIN articles AS a2 ON c.cited_article_id = a2.article_id ORDER BY c.citation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Authors;
SELECT author_name, author_id FROM Authors;
SELECT book_title, publication_date FROM Books WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Books ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT book_title FROM Books WHERE publication_date < '2019-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Authors;
SELECT author_name FROM Authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT book_title, publication_date FROM Books WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS book_count FROM Authors JOIN Books ON Authors.author_id = Books.book_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name, book_title, citation_date FROM Authors JOIN Books ON Authors.author_id = Books.book_id JOIN Citations ON Citations.book_id = Books.book_id ORDER BY citation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS publication_count FROM authors GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT title, abstract, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT keyword_name FROM keywords WHERE keyword_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM publication_keywords JOIN publications ON publication_keywords.publication_id = publications.publication_id JOIN keywords ON publication_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name ASC;
